title: Oral delivery of the non-β-blocking R-carvedilol enantiomer for skin cancer chemoprevention in SKH-1 mice
details: PK Sardar, S Yeung, R Tow, J Luga, M Huang… - AAPS Open, 2025
abstract: Purpose Skin cancer remains the most prevalent cancer worldwide with its incidence continuously rising. Previous studies have demonstrated the efficacy of the β-blocker carvedilol and its non-β-blocking enantiomer R-carvedilol in mitigating UV-induced …
